backend/main.mo: Defines user-related types including moods, gender, relationship intent, avatars, and profiles, plus helpers for converting variants to text.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing two auth-related redirect behaviors and the files implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short descriptions of various frontend files and their recent behavior changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, query client, theming, and global providers for the app.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Empty placeholder file for the app footer component.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header with theme toggle, journal button, user menu, and logout logic that clears state and redirects to root.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Authenticated layout wrapper that redirects to root when identity becomes undefined and renders header, nav, journal, and content.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Bottom navigation bar with icon-first buttons, active state styling, and unread notification badge support.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Shows a floating button for composing a new entry when visible, navigating to /compose on click.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Provides a button to toggle between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks children until Internet Identity is initialized and logged in, otherwise shows loading or login panel.
Renders the login screen with randomized copy, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays a generated circle energy summary inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Lists circle members with profile details and allows removing members via mutation.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Provides a form to submit a share code to request joining a circle.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Shows pending join requests with profile info and actions to accept or decline.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selection of up to two Safe People with recommendations, profile display, and backend updates.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Card UI for viewing, copying, and editing the user's share code with validation and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Wrapper around a button that adds tooltip support for icon-based actions.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible section component with a trigger button for showing additional content.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Displays a mood check‑in reminder card with dismiss and navigate-to-check‑in actions based on daily rules.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Shows a silent signal entry with author info, mood styling, and timestamp formatting.
Allows sending predefined silent signals to safe people, handling loading state and missing setup.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Popover calendar control for selecting a journal date, preventing future dates.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Manages viewing, creating, and deleting journal entries for a selected date with edit restrictions on past days.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Sheet-based journal overlay combining rules info, date picker, and entries panel with optional reset-to-today.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Displays micro‑action suggestions based on mood history, falling back to guidance when insufficient data is available.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood trends over a selected timeframe and shows patterns, distributions, and micro‑action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Allows users to select or upload an avatar, validating files and generating previews while notifying parent components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates access behind profile loading, error handling, and setup flow, showing setup UI or errors when needed.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides new users through multi‑step profile onboarding, validating input and saving the completed profile.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Monitors notifications, feed updates, join requests, and member changes to play corresponding sound effects on new events.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: UI component for selecting predefined or custom context tags with validation and removal support.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Searchable mood picker that groups moods by category and highlights the selected one.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Modal prompting users to write a private note and showing optional micro‑action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a status post with mood styling, author info, timestamps, and private indicators.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Defines predefined context tags and configuration limits for custom tags.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Provides core promise and boundary text for the app.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Contains rotating login screen copy and a helper to pick random phrases.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories used throughout the app.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Lists sound asset paths and associated cue types.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Defines system avatar metadata and a helper to resolve avatar paths.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Context managing visibility state and controls for the floating journal UI element.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Context for opening and closing the journal overlay with optional reset behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Provides a React context for managing sound effects, handling audio unlocking, and exposing play functions and user sound preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor with additional error handling and refetch capability to detect failed actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity loading via an AuthClient-backed context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries using the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a user's mood history from feed data within a timeframe, filtering and mapping their status posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains numerous profile, feed, avatar, and status query/mutation hooks that interact with the backend actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Simple hook that exposes the SoundContext utilities to components.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, including color tokens and safe-area padding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the Circle page with tabs for members, requests, joining by code, and safe people, using feed data to show circle energy.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Displays a list of circles the user belongs to, handling loading, error, and empty states with avatar and profile info.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Shows ranked closest connections based on overlap and interaction, with loading/error states and expandable explanation sections.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Provides a form to compose and post a status with mood, audience, and tags, managing selection state and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Implements the daily check-in flow to post a mood status, enforcing a navigation guard and similar audience/mood logic as compose.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the user's feed with status and silent signal cards, plus reminder logic and refresh controls.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Routes users to public home or authenticated feed depending on identity readiness and login state.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Handles invite-code-based authentication flow, triggering login and auto-joining a circle using a stored invite code.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays unread and read notifications, supports navigation to related status pages, and shows loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user profile, including avatar, preferences, and visibility settings, with save and cancel flows.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page enabling invite code entry or new account creation, with introductory app information.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Authentication start page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects upon success.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single status post with error handling for missing or unauthorized content.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides age calculation, date formatting, and input parsing utilities for birthdate handling.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a unique Principal audience list for a post, always including the author.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Filters recent posts, derives mood-based vibe categories, and generates a weekly Circle Energy summary.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates custom context tags, enforcing length and duplicate checks.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a one‑time sessionStorage guard flag for entering daily check‑in mode.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Stores, normalizes, retrieves, and clears invite codes in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Analyzes recent moods and tags to suggest short micro‑actions using a conservative rule engine.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Computes mood distributions, trends, concern levels, and guidance with a non‑clinical disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Provides Tailwind class mappings for mood category colors and gradients.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Controls once‑per‑day mood reminder behavior using localStorage keyed by date.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Resolves avatar sources, validates uploads, converts files to bytes, and revokes blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric share code without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets the user’s sound‑enabled preference in localStorage with a default of true.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts backend time formats, checks date ranges, and formats dates for display or input.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended design tokens for the app UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, and known issues describing current system state and planned evolutions.
